CLIENT LOGIN

ZENITH WEALTH PARTNERS

Trailblazing a New Approach to WealthFinancial PlanningImpactInvestment ManagementBusiness Advice

Advice that empowers you to reach new heights.

Get Started

AS SEEN IN

WHAT WE DO

Unlock access to quality, relatable financial advice without a minimum.

We are a fee-only, fiduciary, independent comprehensive planning and investment management firm serving clients nationwide, while headquartered in Philadelphia, with offices in New York, Boston, Washington DC, and Charlotte.

Our services focus on delivering tailored advice and helping you implement a unique game plan to manage your money and maximize your lifestyle.

Individuals & Families

Delivered by our growing team of Certified Financial Professionals CFP®, we help clients work toward financial independence and feel more confident in their decision-making.

Read More

Institutions & Enterprises

Based on our proprietary investment process, We develop portfolios customized to meet your time horizon, risk tolerance, investment objectives, and additional financial circumstances.

Read More
Testimonials

Empowering Our Clients to Achieve More

slide 14 to 15 of 4
Chelsey

I have been with Zenith for a short time and already I am seeing an impact in my wealth planning future. What I love most about Adrienne is that she doesn’t just focus on one element of the wealth plan. She focuses on holistic wealth building and has connected me with resources to help me think about a more well rounded wealth plan. I highly recommend engaging with this forward thinking organization!

Alicia

My experience with Zenith Wealth Partners has been exceptional. Nate goes above and beyond to ensure he is prepared and providing you with a wealth of knowledge. He strives to ensure his clients achieve their financial, professional and personal goals. In order to provide the highest level of service to his clients, he aims to be sure we are on target to meet our financial goals. I look forward to continuing being serviced by ZWP and their team.

Xavier

Zenith Wealth Partners has changed the trajectory of my family finances. When we first met Chelsea and team in 2020 we had no direction and no plan, after being with Zenith for 4 years we have seen an increase in our financials and we have a clear path to retirement thanks to Zenith! Chelsea is very proactive when it comes to things like 401K and tax preparation and will always respond to your request. I can not recommend them enough!

Kai

We had a great experience working with Fahmin and Chelsea at Zenith. They were intentional about getting to know us, our financial situation, and our goals. They're very knowledgeable, but also collaborative. It felt like we were building a financial plan together. Because of that, they helped us develop a sense of confidence and direction about our financial future. We're looking forward to continuing working with them. Highly recommend!

Chelsey

All testimonials have been provided by current clients. No client was compensated for providing these testimonials. Zenith Wealth Partners gained each client’s permission to publish their testimonial. Outcomes are personal and specific to each client, and one client’s results do not guarantee identical outcomes in the future for another client. Read all reviews at: https://wealthtender.com/advisory-firms/zenith-wealth-partners/

zenith wealth partners

Who We Serve

You deserve to work with a team that understands you and can help you achieve your unique goals. 

Our ideal clients are looking for a lifelong partner to help them get organized, manage their wealth, and grow toward the life they’ve always imagined.

Institutions Making Community Impact

Interested in socially responsible investing? Build a legacy that changes your community. We have you covered with a forward-thinking approach to advice that puts your foundation's goals and values at the center.

Tech Titan Navigating Stock Awards

Whenever you achieve a new level in your career, it comes with new challenges to navigate in your financial life. High income, stock awards, changing tax landscape – the list goes on and on. Our team can help you to navigate the ups and downs of the tech world and make the most of your money.

Business Owner Who’s Ready to Scale

Ready to scale your operation, get funding, and thrive? Our team is uniquely trained to assist business owners who are ready to grow to the next level. We work with lifestyle consulting businesses and product-based businesses entering first rounds of seed funding, and every business in between

First-Generation Success Story​

It’s challenging to navigate your money and know where to start when you’re the first in your family who has had a financially successful career. We can help with our collaborative, relationship-focused financial planning and investment management.

OUR COMMITTMENT

A True Partnership

Fee Only

We do not accept commissions. We believe it allows you to know our advice is in your best interest and not biased towards a high-commissioned product.

Independent

We are not limited to specific solutions or advice, and we choose our partners, vendors and service providers because we believe they provide the best value to our clients.

Fiduciary

We have a responsibility to put our clients needs above our own. We are required to disclose any current or potential conflicts of interest to our clients, abide by a Code of Ethics, and fully disclose how we are compensated.

More Insights

DISCOVER YOUR FINANCIAL HEALTH

Take Our Financial Fitness Quiz

FAQ

Popular Questions

Do I need to have a certain amount of money to invest with Zenith?

No! Our clients are high earning families and professionals who have a wide range of net worth and investable asset levels. We work to develop long term relationships with clients that extend well beyond investing.

Do you sell financial products or receive commissions?

We do not. We are “fee-only fiduciaries”, which means we must act in each client’s best interest in all scenarios. We do not make commissions, referral fees, or any other payments in addition to the planning and/or advisory fees disclosed in our client agreement.

How do I pay for your services?

Our ongoing wealth planning services can be paid via our AdvicePay portal which accepts ACH, debit card, or credit card. Investment advisory fees are deducted each quarter from any investment accounts managed by Zenith.

Subscribe To Our Newsletter

To stay up-to-date with all the latest from Zenith Wealth Partners, sign up for our newsletter.
